channel.title: HipHopDX News
channel.description: The best HipHop News on the planet.

item.title: T.I. Compares Current Generation Of Hip Hop To Random Amateurs Being Invited To Join NBA
item.description: T.I. believes the biggest issue with today's Rap artists is the sheer volume, comparing Hip Hop to professional basketball being overrun by fans.

item.title: Rihanna Dashes Fans Hopes For New Music Once Again As She Breaks Another Record
item.description: Rihanna has made it clear that she has no intentions of releasing a new album, which is sure to upset the many members of the Rihanna Navy.

item.title: Cardi B Explains ‘Like What’ Coach Bag Diss: ‘You Gotta Be From New York To Understand’
item.description: Cardi B has addressed a viral lyric from her latest track, "Like What," in which she seems to discount the value of luxury brand Coach, sparking fan criticism.

item.title: Ty Dolla $ign Calls Out Apple Music For Failing To Promote 'Vultures 1' On Platform
item.description: Ty Dolla $ign has made it clear that he's none-too-pleased with Apple Music and their failure to promote his joint album with Kanye West, 'Vultures 1.'

item.title: SZA Takes Home 'Best International Artist' At The Brit Awards Over Taylor Swift
item.description: SZA took home the 'Best International Artist' at the 2024 Brit Awards, beating out a number of artists for the prize including Taylor Swift.

item.title: Nicki Minaj Sends Love To Fans Following Fight At First Stop On 'Pink Friday 2 Tour'
item.description: Nicki Minaj has sent a positive note to her diehard fans after a fight broke out during the first night of her highly anticipated ‘Pink Friday 2 Tour.’

item.title: ScHoolboy Q’s ‘Blue Lips’ First Week Sales Projections Are Here
item.description: ScHoolboy Q’s ‘Blue Lips’ first-week sales projections have arrived, and they're impressive for his first new album in five years.

item.title: Big Boi Cracks Joke About Andre 3000 & His Flute Album During Backstage Reunion
item.description: Big Boi has reunited with Andre 3000 after a recent show in Atlanta, GA, and the ex-OutKast MC didn't waste any time in razzing his longtime friend.

item.title: Kid Cudi Details Plans For Two Upcoming Films: ‘Can’t Wait For Y’all To See’
item.description: Kid Cudi announces not one but two projects bound for the big screen, promising fans both a horror film and one very close to his heart.

item.title: Megan Thee Stallion Demonstrates ‘Thee Hottie State Of Mind’ In New Nike Ad
item.description: Megan Thee Stallion debuted the newest phase of her Nike collab on Instagram, inspiring fellow 'hotties' on their path to mental and physical empowerment.

item.title: 4Batz Continues Viral Series With ‘Act III: On God? (She Like)’
item.description: 4Batz has dropped another installment of the viral series that has earned him co-signs from some of the biggest names in the game right now.

item.title: Missy Elliott Responds To Both Cardi B & Bia Using Her Hit Song
item.description: Missy Elliott has stepped between Bia and Cardi B and their respective fandoms, making clear that she gave her blessing to both parties to use her track.

item.title: Beyoncé Shares Strategy For Staying Anonymous: ‘On A Good Day, I Can Sneak Into Target’
item.description: Beyoncé, in a fresh interview with 'CR Fashion Book,' revealed a simple but effective tactic for seeking privacy in public spaces like Target.

item.title: Kodak Black & Jackboy Beef Behind Fatal 2023 Shooting, Authorities Say
item.description: Kodak Black and Jackboy's purported beef has gotten the attention of the cops, who called it the inspiration for a shooting back in 2023.

item.title: Travis Scott & The Weeknd Pop Out For Mike Dean Concert In LA
item.description: Travis Scott and The Weeknd have made a special appearance at a Mike Dean concert in Los Angeles, with unreleased favorites and surprising covers on the bill.

item.title: Joe Budden Proclaims ‘The Girl Rapper Wave Is Over’: ‘Very Few Of Y’all Are Selling Records’
item.description: Joe Budden believes that the hype surrounding women in Hip Hop is over because he doesn't see the results in record sales anymore.

item.title: Kanye West Catches More Shots From Taylor Swift Producer: ‘He Needs His Diaper Changed’
item.description: Kanye West has once again been targeted by Jack Antonoff, who is close friends with Taylor Swift and has worked closely with her on several projects.

item.title: ScHoolboy Q Reveals Whether He’ll Release Deluxe Version Of ‘Blue Lips’
item.description: ScHoolboy Q has shared his thoughts on releasing an extended edition of his latest album 'Blue Lips,' which went live on March 1.

item.title: Meek Mill & Akademiks Offered $1M For Fight By Official Celebrity Boxing CEO
item.description: Meek Mill and Akademiks have been given the chance to handle their issues once and for all in a boxing ring for a $1 million prize, if they want to.

item.title: Travis Scott & Kylie Jenner Selling Beverly Hills Mansion For Discounted Price
item.description: Travis Scott and Kylie Jenner have lowered the price of their Beverly Hills property, revealing that they're willing to sell it for millions less than planned.
